Title: [Our purpose is] to ensure that literature and art fit well into the whole revolutionary machine...
Designer: Beijing Film Academy Jinggangshan Commune (北京电影学院井冈山公社)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The full Mao quotation, from the Talks at the Yan'an Forum on Literature and Art: "[Our purpose is] to ensure that literature and art fit well into the whole revolutionary machine as a component part, that they operate as powerful weapons for uniting and educating the people and for attacking and destroying the enemy, and that they help the people fight the enemy with one heart and one mind."
